contextmenu_show_transform_selected_url_.description: if you have selected a valid url you'll see an additional context menu entry to format it as a hyperlink

contextmenu_show_unlink.description: Whether the contextmenu has an entry to delete/unlink hyperlinks from the selection

contextmenu_show_copy_url.description: Whether the contextmenu has an entry to copy an URL

contextmenu_show_open_in_browser.description: Whether the contextmenu has an entry to open hyperlinks (e.g. in the browser)

contextmenu_show_set_link_text.description: If you have selected a valid url you'll see an additional context menu entry

show_in_reviewer_context_menu.description: Reviewer appear when you right click.

unlink_button_and_shortcut.description: if true there is an unlink button and a shortcut. I rarely use this function and if I do I use the contextmenu. That's why I prefer to set this to "false" to save some space.
